quote: Computers are like Old Testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: Man is still the most extraordinary computer of all.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.
name: Emo Philips

quote: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes.
name: Edsger Dijkstra

quote: To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer.
name: Paul R. Ehrlich

quote: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Computers themselves, and software yet to be developed, will revolutionize the way we learn.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Access to computers and the Internet has become a basic need for education in our society.
name: Kent Conrad

quote: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.
name: Steve Wozniak

quote: We're entering a new world in which data may be more important than software.
name: Tim O'Reilly

quote: I look like a geeky hacker, but I don't know anything about computers.
name: Justin Long

quote: It's hardware that makes a machine fast. It's software that makes a fast machine slow.
name: Craig Bruce

quote: The Internet: transforming society and shaping the future through chat.
name: Dave Barry

quote: Computing is not about computers any more. It is about living.
name: Nicholas Negroponte

quote: The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.
name: Douglas Engelbart

quote: Software comes from heaven when you have good hardware.
name: Ken Olsen

quote: Computers double their performance every month.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Computers are famous for being able to do complicated things starting from simple programs.
name: Seth Lloyd

quote: My goal wasn't to make a ton of money. It was to build good computers.
name: Steve Wozniak

quote: I am such a gearhead. In my recording studio, I personally engineer and edit everything on computers.
name: Tommy Lee

quote: Computers have cut-and-paste functions. So does right-wing historical memory.
name: Rick Perlstein

quote: Today, computers are almost second nature to most of us.
name: James Dyson

quote: We can be incredibly disconnected in this day and age with computers and cell phones.
name: Marcia Gay Harden

quote: Computers are great tools, but they need to be applied to the physical world.
name: Tony Fadell

quote: Video games and computers have become babysitters for kids.
name: Taylor Kitsch

quote: The computer is a moron.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: After a semester or so, my infatuation with computers burnt out as quickly as it had begun.
name: Eric Allin Cornell

quote: Go into the auto mechanic, you've got to know computers to be able to work on the cars.
name: Ann McLane Kuster

quote: I'm a Luddite with computers, and I'm slightly worried about being hacked as well.
name: Jo Brand

quote: People talk about computer programmers as if computers are our whole lives. That's simply not true.
name: Ellen Ullman

quote: Treat your password like your toothbrush. Don't let anybody else use it, and get a new one every six months.
name: Clifford Stoll

quote: Computers do the calculating to allow people to transform the world.
name: Conrad Wolfram

quote: Computers make me totally blank out.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: To err is human - and to blame it on a computer is even more so.
name: Robert Orben

quote: Computers and electronic music are not the opposite of the warm human music. It's exactly the same.
name: Bill Laswell

quote: One of the most feared expressions in modern times is 'The computer is down.'
name: Norman Ralph Augustine

quote: Computer science is one of the worst things that ever happened to either computers or to science.
name: Neil Gershenfeld

quote: Computers have proved to be formidable chess players. In fact, they've beaten our top human chess champions.
name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Computers will understand sarcasm before Americans do.
name: Geoffrey Hinton

quote: Reading computer manuals without the hardware is as frustrating as reading sex manuals without the software.
name: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: I was afraid of the internet... because I couldn't type.
name: Jack Welch

quote: We think of computers as smart and powerful machines. But your goldfish is smarter.
name: Jason Fried

quote: I've always been at the intersection of computers and whatever they can revolutionize.
name: Jeff Bezos

quote: Don't try to be like Jackie. There is only one Jackie. Study computers instead.
name: Jackie Chan

quote: I don't care how big and fast computers are, they're not as big and fast as the world.
name: Herbert A. Simon

quote: I don't look at computers as opponents. For me it is much more interesting to beat humans.
name: Magnus Carlsen

quote: If you like overheads, you'll love PowerPoint.
name: Edward Tufte

quote: I'm not afraid of computers taking over the world.
name: Thom Yorke

quote: Computers and the Internet have made it really easy to rant. It's made everyone overly opinionated.
name: Scott Weiland

quote: I am interested in computers and technology, and art, photography, and design.
name: William Landay

quote: We demand privacy, yet we glorify those that break into computers.
name: Bill McCollum

quote: I wouldn't know how to find eBay on the computer if my life depended on it.
name: Marc Jacobs

quote: By 2029, computers will have emotional intelligence and be convincing as people.
name: Ray Kurzweil

quote: With all the abundance we have of computers and computing, what is scarce is human attention and time.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: I am not the only person who uses his computer mainly for the purpose of diddling with his computer.
name: Dave Barry

quote: Right now, computers, which are supposed to be our servant, are oppressing us.
name: Jef Raskin

quote: I hope that memes jump out of our computers in the future.
name: Colleen Ballinger

quote: Computers are to design as microwaves are to cooking.
name: Milton Glaser

quote: I'm too old-fashioned to use a computer. I'm too old-fashioned to use a quill.
name: Christopher Plummer

quote: Think? Why think! We have computers to do that for us.
name: Jean Rostand

quote: I grew up before computers. Computers are changing things, not all for the good.
name: Graham Hawkes

quote: The big question society will have to answer is whether it wants computers thinking like humans.
name: David Smith

quote: I'm a '70s mom, and my daughter is a '90s mom. I know a lot of women my age who are real computer freaks.
name: Florence Henderson

quote: I do two things. I design mobile computers and I study brains.
name: Jeff Hawkins

quote: The only legitimate use of a computer is to play games.
name: Eugene Jarvis

quote: Dad was very into electronics, robotics and computers, so I was interested in what he was doing.
name: Rhianna Pratchett

quote: Man, I don't want to have nothing to do with computers. I don't want the government in my business.
name: Erykah Badu

quote: I fix my grandchildren's computers.
name: Alan Alda

quote: If I wasn't a professional scientist, I'd be an amateur scientist. But plan B was to go into computers.
name: Michio Kaku

quote: Nobody expects that just because they've made computers better they're going to give them to you free.
name: Dean Kamen

quote: My dad used to work at IBM, so we used to get discounts on computers and stuff, and I did have a ThinkPad.
name: Jimmy Fallon

quote: Look at what Silicon Valley has done - the advance of computers.
name: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Your computer needn't be the first thing your see in the morning and the last thing you see at night.
name: Simon Mainwaring

quote: A wonderful thing about a book, in contrast to a computer screen, is that you can take it to bed with you.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Pixar is not about computers, it's about people.
name: John Lasseter

quote: Shareware tends to combine the worst of commercial software with the worst of free software.
name: Linus Torvalds

quote: I am not great at computers. If I were to try shopping through Google, I'd end up with 33 vests.
name: Mary Berry

quote: I get hired to hack into computers now and sometimes it's actually easier than it was years ago.
name: Kevin Mitnick

quote: Juries are not computers. They are composed of human beings who evaluate evidence differently.
name: Alan Dershowitz

quote: In order to be truly intelligent, computers must understand - that is probably the critical word.
name: Paul Allen

quote: I first got interested in the brain through computers.
name: Paul Allen

quote: My whole life had been designing computers I could never build.
name: Steve Wozniak

quote: Even when I work with computers, with high technology, I always try to put in the touch of the hand.
name: Issey Miyake

quote: Computers intimidate me.
name: Dylan Lauren

quote: Machine learning is the science of getting computers to learn without being explicitly programmed.
name: Sebastian Thrun

quote: Humans are still much better than computers at recognizing speech.
name: Geoffrey Hinton

quote: My background was in graphic design, but when I was doing it, it was all hand-drawn stuff, not computers.
name: Jeffrey Dean Morgan

quote: The Internet is a powerful way to make lots of money... But we are not going to buy Yahoo!
name: Sumner Redstone

quote: We resemble computers intellectually and animals emotionally.
name: Mother Angelica

quote: Computers ought to help people find their own best path through lots of textual information.
name: Mitch Kapor

quote: Computers are very expensive and they need power, and that can be a problem in Africa.
name: Mo Ibrahim

quote: My mom was a biological illustrator for a time before computers replaced that job.
name: Jeff Vandermeer

quote: Something else has happened with computers.
name: Seth Lloyd

quote: I'm not very technically minded. I mean, I don't know how to do e-mail on computers.
name: Kate Winslet

quote: People are good at intuition, living our lives. What are computers good at? Memory.
name: Eric Schmidt

quote: I am very bad at computers. I don't really know how to write email.
name: Marjane Satrapi

quote: Computers in classrooms are the filmstrips of the 1990s.
name: Clifford Stoll

quote: In short, software is eating the world.
name: Marc Andreessen

quote: I don't like computers. I still like to do my drawings by hand.
name: Dieter Rams

quote: Nowadays shots are created in post-production, on computers. It's not really photography.
name: Mary Ellen Mark

quote: I don't know anything about computers.
name: Adam Carolla

quote: I'm a very simple person. I don't use computers.
name: Carrie-Anne Moss

quote: But computers have changed the world for everyone, so there will be some way of working it out.
name: Debbie Harry

quote: One thing that humans still do better than computers is recognize images.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: Computers are hierarchical. We have a desktop and hierarchical files which have to mean everything.
name: Ted Nelson

quote: I'm encouraging kids to use computers at their own pace to build aspirations.
name: Sugata Mitra

quote: I honestly believe that people sit behind their computers and just get really brave.
name: Leslie Jones

quote: My first computers were a Timex Sinclair and an Apple II.
name: Walt Mossberg

quote: I think computers are the ultimate writing tool. I'm a very slow writer, so I appreciate it every day.
name: Sherry Turkle

quote: I went on to Harvard and got very interested in computers and studying the earth's landscape.
name: Jack Dangermond

quote: I think that what computers have done is just disastrous to the language.
name: Gary Paulsen

quote: I loathe computers more and more, so I have one I can shut down and shelve like a book.
name: Will Self

quote: I am cursed with computers; something always goes wrong.
name: Carla Bruni

quote: Most computers today have built in backup software.
name: Barton Gellman

quote: I favor pocket-sized hard drives that travel between home and office, syncing with computers on both ends.
name: Barton Gellman

quote: The future of filmmaking is to make the canvas bigger, something you can't enjoy on your phones or computers.
name: Sidharth Malhotra

quote: The technological revolution at home makes it much easier for computers to do our work.
name: Fareed Zakaria

quote: Computers have virtually replaced tape recorders.
name: Tony Visconti

quote: Computers get better faster than anything else ever.
name: Erik Brynjolfsson

quote: Computers, like automobiles and airplanes, do only what people tell them to do.
name: Bill James

quote: Companies are accustomed to dismissing employees for misuse of computers at work.
name: Bill Dedman

quote: If being the biggest company was a guarantee of success, we'd all be using IBM computers and driving GM cars.
name: James Surowiecki

quote: If your computer speaks English, it was probably made in Japan.
name: Alan Perlis

quote: In computing, turning the obvious into the useful is a living definition of the word 'frustration'.
name: Alan Perlis

quote: Our lives sometimes depend on computers performing as predicted.
name: Philip Emeagwali

quote: Every company that made computers when we started the Mac, they're all gone.
name: Phil Schiller

quote: Even in the developing parts of the world, kids take to computers like fish to water.
name: Nicholas Negroponte

quote: You couldn't have fed the '50s into a computer and come out with the '60s.
name: Paul Kantner

quote: Today, computers help us making the music. It's really a tool.
name: Yael Naim

quote: What do we want our kids to do? Sweep up around Japanese computers?
name: Walter F. Mondale

quote: No one ever said on their deathbed, 'Gee, I wish I had spent more time alone with my computer'.
name: Danielle Berry

quote: I'm pretty into computers. I used to be a lot more into it when I was younger.
name: Cameron Dallas

quote: I'm a very methodical writer. Before computers, I used reams of paper and stacks of index cards.
name: Frank Peretti

quote: There has never been an unexpectedly short debugging period in the history of computers.
name: Steven Levy

quote: Bill Gates is the pope of the personal computer industry. He decides who's going to build.
name: Larry Ellison

quote: Computers will be able to do all the mundane tasks in our daily lives.
name: Aaron Swartz

quote: I just think there's a general interest in the world of computers.
name: Irwin Winkler

quote: There is no reason for any individual to have a computer in his home.
name: Ken Olsen

quote: Comic books aren't nerdy. You'd have to be an idiot to think computers are nerdy.
name: Adam Brody

quote: I always loved computers - it's something inside you.
name: George M. Church

quote: I just became one with my browser software.
name: Bill Griffith

quote: I just grew up liking computers and stuff like that. Mainly cool stuff, like video games.
name: Thomas Middleditch

quote: I'm into computers and have been for a while.
name: Thomas Middleditch

quote: Growing up, I spent my time doing useless stuff looking at computers.
name: Tobias Lutke

quote: Computing is no more about work - it's all about making work happen with computers.
name: Pranav Mistry

quote: My life's goal is to get rid of computers and invent everything that removes its necessity.
name: Pranav Mistry

quote: When I write software, I know that it will fail, either due to my own mistake, or due to some other cause.
name: Wietse Venema

quote: If you could utilize the resources of the end users' computers, you could do things much more efficiently.
name: Niklas Zennstrom

quote: The power of the computer is starting to spread.
name: Bill Budge

quote: People need to get out and do some more exercise, especially children who are stuck inside with computers.
name: Katie Taylor

quote: Modern people are only willing to believe in their computers, while I believe in myself.
name: Alain Robert

quote: I like computers as a tool. I like them as an instrument. I think they're just pretty.
name: Dallas Roberts

quote: I've always been slightly embittered about computers because it was the only subject I failed at school.
name: Matt Frewer

quote: I've found that people who design computers don't know a lot about displays.
name: Mary Lou Jepsen

quote: Computers were programmed to swap out error-prone, inconsistent human calculation with digital perfection.
name: David Autor

quote: What we did not imagine was a Web of people, but a Web of documents.
name: Dale Dougherty

quote: When the first computers started to come in, we tried to digitalize the seismological equipment.
name: Frank Press

quote: I didn't know much about computers. I still worked on a manual Olivetti typewriter.
name: Mona Simpson

quote: I got interested in computers and how they could be enslaved to the megalomaniac impulses of a teenager.
name: Eugene Jarvis

quote: Computers can't find the unexpected, but people can when they eyeball the data.
name: Debra Fischer

quote: The future lies in designing and selling computers that people don't realize are computers at all.
name: Adam Osborne

quote: Every piece of software written today is likely going to infringe on someone else's patent.
name: Miguel de Icaza

quote: My e-mail address is actually my wife's e-mail address. I actually hate computers.
name: Joe Sakic

quote: I don't really love computers.
name: John Maeda

quote: Gee, I am a complete Luddite when it comes to computers, I can barely log on!
name: Jonathan Shapiro

quote: Doing a movie about computers between 1978 and 1982? You can't get much less sexy, less active than that.
name: Joshua Michael Stern

quote: You can't have thousands of cars without good computers on the electric grid.
name: Shai Agassi

quote: There were no PCs when I started programming on computers.
name: Dave Winer

quote: You can't trust the internet.
name: Nicollette Sheridan

quote: In 1983, before computers came along, it wasn't easy to do electronic basslines and rhythms.
name: Gillian Gilbert

quote: I just bought a Mac to help me design the next Cray.
name: Seymour Cray

quote: The internet is not for sissies.
name: Paul Vixie

quote: There's my education in computers, right there; this is the whole thing, everything I took out of a book.
name: Howard Aiken

quote: For computer communications, computers talk in little bursts. They're not continuous like speech.
name: Bob Kahn

quote: If net neutrality goes away, it will fundamentally change everything about the Internet.
name: James Hilton

quote: I've tried word processors, but I think I'm too old a dog to use one.
name: Dee Brown

quote: With my wife Camille's help, I took to social networking. I'm working with the computers.
name: Bill Cosby
